description:
Vulcanus is the self-proclaimed goddess of "love and justice". Named after the Roman god of fire, she is the first-born sister who resides in the body of http://anidb.net/ch34014 [Kujou Tsukiyo], though more often personified in the form of her doll, Luna. Unlike her sisters, Vulcanus has bad eyesight and hearing, and cannot walk, but can instead possess an object. When Vulcanus takes over Tsukiyo`s body, her hair becomes darker.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Vulcanus
